Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text: Churros tasted old and stale, felt like it was made in the morning and reheated when I bought it (around 9 o clock). The prices are also very expensive and paying with card charges an extra fee (2018 cmon). Also pretty expensive (4 churros with saucefor 6 euro.) Would not buy again.

Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text: Fast and service was friendly. Food was decent, not spectacular.

Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text: Tasty crepes, welcoming staff and pleasant interior.

Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text:
The chicken burger was horrible !!! What a waste !!
Do you self a favour and go to MC Donald's!!!

Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text: Fast food in the centre of Amsterdam

Name: Mondial Crepes & Waffles
Review Text: Would rate it in minus if I Could. Ordered the churros and they were as hard as a rock. When I complained, the server had an attitude aswell and was very rude. Avoid at all costs.
